Files

FileBrowser

FXVerticalFrame subclass with a child FXDirList.  Provides context menus for directories and files in order to open or import them into the current project.

Summary
FileBrowser
FXVerticalFrame subclass with a child FXDirList.
Functions
FileBrowser
create
~FileBrowser
openFile
Opens a file with given filename in the tabbed editor
openFiles
Opens all files in a given directory in the editor.
deleteFile
Deletes a file after asking the user if he is really sure he wants to
